description: This course is a continuation of CHEM 247 topics.  Chemistry 248 delves into the
chemistry of functional groups, especially those that play a role in the reactivity of
biomolecules such as carbohydrates, lipids, proteins ,and nucleic acids.  Together, CHEM
247 and CHEM 248 provide a full treatment of introductory organic chemistry.  Offered
annually in the spring semester.  Counts toward environmental studies major
(natural science emphasis). Prerequisite: CHEM 247 or permission of instructor.
